subject: Football
Sports Injuries
Concussions
lead_paragraph: As the Jets played the Browns, it took all of 14 minutes for a concussion to occur, another 25 for a star to tear up his knee, and three and a half quarters for a player to be carted off the field.
snippet: As the Jets played the Browns, it took all of 14 minutes for a concussion to occur, another 25 for a star to tear up his knee, and three and a half quarters for a player to be carted off the field.
